item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 6:50, so let's meet at 6:20 right inside the theater ticket lobby.

Paul will be leading this meetup, as I can't make it. Sorry! Last-minute thing. I'm bummed to miss the movie with you all, but it's unavoidable. He'll have the discount tickets and a big smile, as always!

-Dana

-----------------------
OLD STUFF:
The teenage girl in me can't wait for the third Twilight movie, called Eclipse! I've been away for a bit, but now I'm back calling on all of you to come with me. There's action for the guys, there's tons of romance for the girls. Apparently this is the best of the 3 Twilight movies so far.

SUMMARY:
In ECLIPSE, Bella once again finds herself surrounded by danger as Seattle is ravaged by a string of mysterious killings and a malicious vampire continues her quest for revenge. In the midst of it all, she is forced to choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob -- knowing that her decision has the potential to ignite the ageless struggle between vampire and werewolf. With her graduation quickly approaching, Bella is confronted with the most important decision of her life.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Eclipse!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Twilight: Eclipse
